string-array.name: v101
string-array.item: IMPORTANT: If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES AFTER APPLYING/UPDATING!
Use light grey as Contact tile colors for Dialer and Contacts - to maximize readability.
Fix Dropbox Icon for Settings -> Account.
Change Contact\'s Edit Contact Accent (colorAccent to white) - while retaining FastScroll color.
FastScroll Framework Overhaul - using colorPrimary instead of colorControlActivated.
Experimental framework changes for DeviceDefault - fixing date picker dialog.
Update SystemUI for internal notification changes.
Fix up Sony Sketch\'s Hardcoded Accents - and fix floating action button.
Add Bliss Floating Menu Icon for Bliss Interface.
Gmail: An alternative way to achieve black windowBackground - fix overflow menu as well.
Remove more traces of Dropbox Material Blue.
Fix invisible drag handle in Google Play Music.
